TopicTitle: Biggest kick wins! KSP Penalty kick challenge.

Articles.Content:
So... its time for your kerbals to do the penalty kick. The enemy team doesnt even know what is waiting for them, but their keeper is praying...

Lets make a little competition here. The furthest ball will win. You can use mods, you have to use the smaller ball. And you have to kick it!

Rules: Attaching anything to the ball, moving the... "foot" or the ball away is disallowed. The kick must happen on the runway.

The distance of the kick is between the stopped ball and a foot. Simply mark the ball as a target.

Provide pics! I will make the leaderboard if more people will join.

And obviously, i got the idea of this challenge by... doing it by myself ^^

Good luck!
There is an update! Squad made a modpack, they added two football balls and some flags. http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/82936-SQUAD-S-Kerbin-Cup-Add-On-Discussion-Thread

OK soooo Thats 346 meters....... I dont know how far yours went

Javascript is disabled. View full album
